titleStmt.title: The Common-wealtsh's [sic] remembrancer for discovery of the disturbers of her peace with a loving reproof to such offendors and a caveat to others to beware of them / by a friend to peace with truth and true liberty, R.H.
titleStmt.author: Hubberthorn, Richard, 1628-1662.

notesStmt.note: Written by Richard Hubberthorn. Cf. Wing.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
